summary: Habit tracker with monthly-adjustable targets: add monthly increasing (+5/month) targets for press-ups and squats, and remove target functionality for 16/8 fasting, run, and squash where not applicable.
architectural_notes: Targets can be habit-specific: some habits use monthly-increasing numeric targets (+5/month), while others have no target section when not applicable.
known_issues: Press-ups and squash habits/targets did not update as expected (user reported).

existing_features.title: Update the Monthly Targets auto-plan defaults so that both “Press-ups” and “Squats” receive monthly-increasing targets that climb by +5 each month according to the Steady Climb plan shown in the uploaded image.
Fix Monthly Targets to correctly show and edit persisted monthly target overrides from the backend (instead of always showing only the auto-plan default and ignoring saved values).
Remove monthly target functionality from “16/8 fasting”, “Run”, and “Squash” so targets are not shown as applicable and cannot be edited for these habits.

Clean up the Monthly Targets section layout to look less messy (consistent spacing/alignment and clearer separation between habit name, target display, and edit controls), matching the structure shown in the uploaded image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add monthly increasing targets for press-ups (+5 each month) based on steady climb plan
Add monthly increasing targets for squats (+5 each month) based on steady climb plan
Remove targets for 16/8 fasting (targets not applicable)
Remove targets for run (targets not applicable)
Remove targets for squash (targets not applicable)

projectName: Fix monthly targets: press-ups & squats steady-climb defaults; disable targets for fasting/run/squash; clean up targets UI
